main: Gains {status:DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair} over time passively at a rate of 3 per turn.
Gains additional {status:DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair} per use of S1 or S2.

This buff increases his Coin Power and damage for his skills as well as increasing their {status:Burst} application. He also gains +1 speed at 10+ stack and +1 {status:ParryingResultUp} and {status:HitDamageUp} at 20+ stack. At 30+ stack, he starts receiving increasing HP and SP damage every turn until he dies.
At 15+ stack, his defense skill causes him to retreat instead. This halves his stacks when he returns.
other: At 15 Potency and 3 Count of {status:Burst} on his target, his S1 and S2 stops applying {status:Burst} and instead inflicts {status:DefenseDown}. His S3 also stops applying {status:Burst}, but instead gives him +4 Coin Power.

His passive gives him a shield based on his {status:DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair} stacks at 6+ speed or if he has {status:Agility} (gained on S2 at 30- {status:DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair} or S3 without the Coin Power conditional).
He gives {status:ParryingResultUp} to 2 allies next turn when he retreats.

1101101.desc: Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 20%)
1101101.name: A moment, please...

1101102.desc: <For Chain Battles> When, after Retreating with '[Retreat]', if this unit rejoins the battle, halve the [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] value (once per Encounter, rounded up)
1101102.name: I'll do better next time...

1101111.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 20%)
Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)
- Lasts for 1 additional turn for every 15 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair] (2 more turns max)
1101111.name: A moment, please...

1101121.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed hits an enemy with [Burst], inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per enemy per turn)
1101121.name: Speedy Courier

descs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair]
- If this unit has less than 15 [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair], gain 1 additional [DevyatDimensionalSackSinclair]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count

data.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not inflict [Burst] with this Skill's On Hit effects; instead, it inflicts 2 [DefenseDown] (once per Coin)
